name: Introduction to Cultural Studies
description: An introduction to the basic principles and theories of Cultural Studies.

name: Intro to Visual Culture
description: An introduction to the field of Visual Culture, including its historical development and its relationship to other fields.

name: Semiotics
description: An introduction to the study of symbols and signs in culture, including an understanding of their structure and function.

name: Visual Representation and Interpretation
description: A study of visual representation and interpretation, including visual rhetoric and visual argumentation.

name: Advanced Visual Culture Theory
description: An in-depth exploration of the theories and critiques of Visual Culture, including an analysis of the power dynamics at play in the production and interpretation of visual media.
